Texts.Chs: 耳廓狐对翼族人的看法
秘密，我们认为如何品尝翼族人和知道什么是味道。必须知道，因为饥饿让鸟更美味。喜欢食物，喜欢打猎，喜欢鸟类。 也许我们可以叶族人谈谈，看看他们是如何逃脱追杀并吃掉鲛人的。那么我们对鸟人也是一样的。
Texts.Eng: Secret, we think on how to taste Avians and know what is taste. Must know, because hunger makes birds even tastier. Fenerox like food, and like hunt, and like birds. Maybe us speak to Floran, see how them is gets away with kill and eat Hylotl. Then us do same for bird people.

Texts.Chs: 多亏了鼠族人，我们又遇到了新的物种。叫做翼族人。这对我们来说是个大问题，因为翼族人闻起来和看起来都很好吃。真的，真的很好吃。耳廓狐的本能总是“杀鸟，吃鸟” ，但我们不允许杀死和吃这些鸟。此外，这些鸟有可怕的闪亮宝石枪。可能也不喜欢被吃掉。
Texts.Eng: We have met new species again, thanks to Kirhos. Is called Avians. Big problem for us there, because Avians smell and look tasty. Really, really tasty. Fenerox instinct always 'kill bird, eat bird' but us not allowed to kill and eat these birds. Also, these birds have scary shiny gem guns. Likely also dislike being eated.
